## http namespace

## Classes

| Class                                                                                | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [BasicAuthHeaderValue](./test-equivalence-matchers.http.basicauthheadervalue.md)     | Matches the value part of a basic auth header with the supplied username and password - useful in conjunction with the StateVariable matcher                                                                                              |
| [BearerTokenHeaderValue](./test-equivalence-matchers.http.bearertokenheadervalue.md) | Matches the value part of a OIDC or OAuth header with the supplied token - useful in conjunction with the StateVariable matcher                                                                                                           |
| [HttpRequest](./test-equivalence-matchers.http.httprequest.md)                       | Matches any HTTP Request with the provided properties                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [HttpResponse](./test-equivalence-matchers.http.httpresponse.md)                     | Matches any HTTP Response with the provided properties                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| [HttpStatusCode](./test-equivalence-matchers.http.httpstatuscode.md)                 | Matches an HTTP status code                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [UriEncodedString](./test-equivalence-matchers.http.uriencodedstring.md)             | <p>Convenience matcher to treat the string as a uri encoded string - useful in <code>path</code> segments.</p><p>During matching, the actual value is decoded with <code>decodeUriComponent()</code> and passed to the child matcher.</p> |
